column4: Hey, anyone able to help me get my Nvidia Card to work?  I used instructions at      http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Ubuntu:Feisty   , and when I log in to finish and configure, I get the "Cannot display this video mode" black screen on my moniter

Hey, anyone able to help me get my Nvidia Card to work?  I used instructions at      http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Ubuntu:Feisty   , and when I log in to finish and configure, I get the "Cannot display this video mode" black screen on my moniter.  Any help? I am on aim (madskateskillz) if you can help me one-on-one.
